languages.text: "Род Гапрак направил шаттлы с грузами священных технологий и подготовленных деталей, способных заменить изношенные сочленения и узлы механизмов. Машинные духи сих устройств были успокоены и покорно дремлют в ожидании ваших решений, на что употребить их могущество".

traits.locale_text: "Род Гапрак направил шаттлы с грузами священных технологий и подготовленных деталей, способных заменить изношенные сочленения и узлы механизмов. Машинные духи сих устройств были успокоены и покорно дремлют в ожидании ваших решений, на что употребить их могущество".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."
languages.original_text: "Род Гапрак направил шаттлы с грузами священных технологий и подготовленных деталей, способных заменить изношенные сочленения и узлы механизмов. Машинные духи сих устройств были успокоены и покорно дремлют в ожидании ваших решений, на что употребить их могущество".

traits.locale_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified — they slumber peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."
traits.speaker: Clemence

The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified — they slumber peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « La maison Gaprak a envoyé des navettes chargées de technologie sacrée et de pièces manufacturées pour remplacer les vieilles jointures et connexions au cœur des systèmes. Les esprits de la machine de ces appareils ont été pacifiés. Ils sommeillent paisiblement dans l'attente de votre décision sur la manière d'exploiter leurs capacités. »
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Gaprak a envoyé des navettes chargées de technologie sacrée et de pièces manufacturées pour remplacer les vieilles jointures et connexions au cœur des systèmes. Les esprits de la machine de ces appareils ont été pacifiés. Ils sommeillent paisiblement dans l'attente de votre décision sur la manière d'exploiter leurs capacités. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “贾帕克家族送来了许多艘穿梭机，里面装着神圣的机械与零件，可以用来维修舰船内部的旧机器。这些装置的机魂已经得到了安抚，目前正在沉睡，等待您的差遣。”
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: “贾帕克家族送来了许多艘穿梭机，里面装着神圣的机械与零件，可以用来维修舰船内部的旧机器。这些装置的机魂已经得到了安抚，目前正在沉睡，等待您的差遣。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「ギャプラック家からは神聖な技術を搭載したシャトルと、機構内の古い接合部や接続部の交換に使用できる加工部品が送られてきました。これらの装置の機械精霊は鎮められております。その能力を閣下がどのように使うか決断するまで、彼らは静かに眠っているのです」
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: 「ギャプラック家からは神聖な技術を搭載したシャトルと、機構内の古い接合部や接続部の交換に使用できる加工部品が送られてきました。これらの装置の機械精霊は鎮められております。その能力を閣下がどのように使うか決断するまで、彼らは静かに眠っているのです」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Haus Gaprak hat Shuttles mit heiliger Technologie geschickt und Teile fertigen lassen, mit denen sich alte Verbindungen und Anschlüsse in Mechanismen ersetzen lassen. Die Maschinengeister in diesen Geräte sind befriedet worden. Mittlerweile schlummern sie friedlich und warten auf Eure Entscheidung, wie Ihr ihre Fähigkeiten einsetzen wollt."
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Gaprak hat Shuttles mit heiliger Technologie geschickt und Teile fertigen lassen, mit denen sich alte Verbindungen und Anschlüsse in Mechanismen ersetzen lassen. Die Maschinengeister in diesen Geräte sind befriedet worden. Mittlerweile schlummern sie friedlich und warten auf Eure Entscheidung, wie Ihr ihre Fähigkeiten einsetzen wollt."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «La casa Gaprak ha enviado lanzaderas cargadas con tecnologías sagradas y piezas manufacturadas que podemos utilizar para reemplazar viejas juntas y conexiones en ciertos mecanismos. Los espíritus máquina de esos artefactos han sido apaciguados. Ahora dormitan plácidamente, esperando a que usted decida cómo hacer uso de sus capacidades».
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Gaprak ha enviado lanzaderas cargadas con tecnologías sagradas y piezas manufacturadas que podemos utilizar para reemplazar viejas juntas y conexiones en ciertos mecanismos. Los espíritus máquina de esos artefactos han sido apaciguados. Ahora dormitan plácidamente, esperando a que usted decida cómo hacer uso de sus capacidades».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Gaprak Hanesi, kutsal teknolojiler ile mekanizmalardaki eski bağlantılar ve boğumları onarmada kullanılabilecek parçalar taşıyan mekikler gönderdi. Bu cihazlardaki makine ruhları yatıştırılmış hâlde. Kabiliyetlerinden nasıl yararlanacağınız konusundaki kararınızı huzur içinde uyuyarak bekliyorlar."
languages.original_text: "House Gaprak has sent shuttles carrying sacred technology and manufactured parts that can be used to replace old joints and connections within mechanisms. The machine spirits of these devices have been pacified. They are slumbering peacefully as they await your decision on how to employ their capabilities."

traits.locale_text: Gaprak Hanesi kutsal teknolojiler ve mekanizmalardaki eski bağlantıları ve boğumları onarmak için kullanılabilecek, üretilmiş parçalar taşıyan mekikler gönderdi. Bu cihazlardaki makine ruhları yatıştırılmış hâlde. Kabiliyetlerinden nasıl yararlanacağınız konusundaki kararınızı huzur içinde uyuyarak bekliyorlar."
traits.speaker: Clemence
